Class UserPreference

java.lang.Object

public final class UserPreference
extends java.lang.Object

API class for use with user preferences..

getValue

public static java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String name)
                                 throws AppException,
                                        InformationalException
Returns a user preference value for the current user based on the preference name. If the preference is not found then null is returned.

Parameters:
name - the user preference name.
Returns:
the value for a user preference or null if the preference could not be found.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Error Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Error Signature.
See Also:
UserPreference.setValue(String, String)

getValue

public static java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String userName)
                                 throws AppException,
                                        InformationalException
Returns a user preference based on the preference name and a username. If the preference is not found then null is returned.

Parameters:
name - the user preference name.
userName - the user name.
Returns:
a user preference based on the preference name and a username or null if the preference could not be found.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Error Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Error Signature.
